prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sleek aquatic creature with a graceful body and flowing fins.
Imagine a Pokemon with a shimmering blue color palette, large ears, and a playful personality swimming in the ocean.
Show me a Pokemon that is inspired by sea creatures, with vibrant blue and white features, and a friendly demeanor.
Generate an elegant water-type Pokemon that has a smooth, wavy shape and can blend seamlessly into its aquatic habitat.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of water, featuring a unique tail and charming facial expressions.
Design a creature that has a beautiful aqua color scheme, large fins, and is known for its playful nature in the water.
Give me a Pokemon that has a sleek body, flowing fins, and an ability to create waves in the ocean.
